My Employer 2

I got promoted in work. That was the best sort of support.

The course she was doing improved the way she did her job. That made it easy to promote her when the opportunity arose

(Employer)

Employers can support you in the following ways?

Financial support

Study leave

Exam leave

Access to more interesting work using your new skills

Support is normally available through HR department.

Tip:

Highlight to your employer the ways in which doing the course will benefit them and improve the way you do your job.
